attributes.contentHtml:
He keeps claiming that another website, is using his modification, but both are using the same free template.

Modification's that Chirag says they stole:
Dark/Light mode switch
The whole JS code
One extra box.

http://eggactyl.cloud - Chirag's website
https://categg.us

The template: https://cruip.com/demos/switch/

The thing that everyone tries to tell him is that he didn't create the template, so he can't own some modifications like the extra feature box which is still based on the template.
